sub_title: Automation Specialist Northern Cluster at Ortho Clinical Diagnostics
summary:
I could be characterized as a pleasant, calm and convincing person. I have the ability to analyse complex situations and translate these is in a logic, plan wise approach.  This for soft- and hardware (development), sales/ marking, financial and regulatory situations.

I have a bachelor degree and I’m able to work on a university level.

Being an entrepreneur is for me a challenge and I like to solve problems. In a group of people, I demonstrated to be a leader and coach. I have a wide interest and knowledge in automation technology, software and networking architecture.  

My background and experience, especially in the laboratory world, makes me a versatile employee. I have showed and like to operate professionally also outside The Netherlands.

profile_positions.description: The Automation Specialist for the region UK, Scandinavia and the Benelux, acts as the project lead to ensure the successful implementation and continuation of the Ortho lab automation products. Also he will act as a subject matter expert for sales, tender, installation and implementation activities. The Automation specialist develops a close partnership at all organizational levels with the customers and local Ortho Sales and Support Teams.
profile_positions.title: Automation Specialist Northern Cluster

profile_positions.description:
Acts as the Project Lead (PMP certified) to ensure professional and timely installations of our Lab Automation Systems. I will also be providing expertise and SW Application support to ensure great customer experience and to help the sales organization drive new business.

- Provide sales support in order to understand and define the scope of the individual Lab Automation projects
- Project Management - acts as the implementation project lead to ensure all aspects of the project are completed to achieve the successful implementation of the lab automation system in the Clinical Laboratory environment and ensure customer satisfaction.
- Be the SME for the Lab Automation and Middleware SW product internally and externally. Collect specifications and build or modify system configurations to ensure customer needs. Ensure that specifications are understood and project timelines are understood and meet customer expectations
- Coordinate execution of the on-site testing procedures and is responsible for the Operational Qualification and trains customer on basic system operation 
- Communicates effectively to LA Implementation Team, Sales and Business Field team, and reports active and proactive to LAPM
- Stays current with all administrative responsibilities, up to date with training courses to ensure compliance
profile_positions.title: Global Laboratory Automation Support Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Stakeholder of developing a new global Hettich business unit for laboratory automation and creating new soft- and hardware products,  Sales, marketing and service activities in the Benelux 

- Facilitate business growth by working worldwide together with clients as well as business partners (engineering companies, software develpers, suppliers, technology providers, etc.).
- Manage sales and support actvities 
- Manager for Service Engineer and Product Specialist
- Training sales- and support teams in soft- and hardware products
- Build and maintain global high-level contacts with current and prospective customer and other business and project partners.
- Steakholder of market analyse, customer needs, soft- and hardware user requirements, marketing-, sales-,  financial- and production plans 
- Act as a mediator between end-users, business partners, soft- hardware developers, production, regluratory and management
- Monitoring quality and production regulations/guidelines like ISO 13485, ISO 17025, GAMP, FDA 21 CFR Part 11, Annex 11, AGILE, GMP, GLP.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description:

profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager Laboratory Automation

profile_positions.description:
From July 2010 till January 2011: Interim Sales Manager in combination with Product Manager Laboratory Automation. Responsible for the Sales department: 3 accountmanagers and 2 product managers 

Product Manager Laboratory Automation:
Creating new and supporting customers using automation products
- Leading of Sales Projects, mainly for Laboratory Automation
- LEAN specialist for workflow optimalisation, project management (critical chain management) 
- Leading in the development of new software products
- Project leader for on-site laboratory informatics and automation implementations activities including LIS/Middleware communication
- Responsible for the product lines including marketing, communication to the supplier, customer feedback, customer questions etc
- Organizing and giving trainings (in- and external)
- Close cooperation with Salesmanager concerning pricing, profitability, competitors, development and introducing new products
- Customer support
profile_positions.title: Product Manager Laboratory Automation

profile_positions.description:
Area: EMEA. IT solutions for Medical Laboratories.
Sales support, Consulting, Implementation, training, Support
profile_positions.title: Information technology Specialist EMEA, Technology Supervisor Abbott Vascular

profile_positions.description:
- Sales Support: inventory, demonstrations, presentations, advise
- Implementation: installation, interfacing, implementation, application- and Technical training
- After Sales: maintenance, failures, updates, advise
- Development: involved with the development of IT products, co-operation with R&D in the USA, Austria and Spain
- During main activities communication with 
   * Roche Product management and Sales
   * Customer Laboratory Management, lab workers, lab- and hospital IT.
profile_positions.title: Information Technology Specialist Laboratories
Product Specialist Image Analysis software and Digital Imaging
